Package ch.hepia.devices.device

Class StateDevice

java.lang.Object
ch.hepia.devices.device.StateDevice
All Implemented Interfaces:
Device
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoffeeMachine, Printer
public abstract class StateDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements Device
Device abstraction that contains a status and a unique ID. A device can be shutdown, started or restarted.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    StateDevice()
    Constructs a device with a random initial state and a unique id
    StateDevice​(Status status)
    Constructs a device with a status and set an unique id

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract java.lang.String getType()
    Return a String representation of the device type
    java.lang.String id()
    Return the device id
    static StateDevice random()
    Randomly Return a printer or a coffee machine
    void reboot()
    Simulate a reboot operation.
    void shutdown()
    Simulate a stop operation.
    void start()
    Simulate a start operation.
    Status status()
    Return the current state of the device
